channel.title: Connect with Everlytic

description.p: "We wanted to be the masters of our own destiny and build our own product." – Everlytic CIO and Founder, Sam Hutchinson

Everlytic was established in 2004, in the garage of a Parktown home. Since then, we’ve seen our product develop into the sophisticated business marketing tool that it is today. We now employ over 60 staff members, with offices in Johannesburg and Cape Town.

We’re Awesome and We Know It! Everlytic is a level 4 BEE contributor and our software is 100% South African, built by our team of talented software engineers. We’ve been ranked the fastest growing tech company in South Africa and the third fastest in Africa by Deloitte. Most recently, Everlytic was also nominated as a Top 10 finalist in PWC’s 2015 Vision to Reality Awards.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Everlytic is a digital messaging platform that helps your business communicate personally, reliably, and automatically over email and SMS. At scale.
channel.itunes:author: Everlytic | Solid Gold Studios

item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to Everlytic
item.description:
Today Karyn Strybos talks to the Everlytic CIO and Founder about how the company started, its values, it's people, its products, and where the company is on its way to.

Have a look at Everlytic's newest features click here

Schedule a Demo www.everlytic.co.za
